name: Game controller visualized and controlled with Interactive compoenents!
description:
Sign up for the interactive components beta Here

Hello!

Connect your gamepad, fire up the prototype, and have fun! (*if your game controller is not setup yet, try "W" "A" "S" "D")

(to actually use game pad to interact, you must duplicate file, view prototype there)


I was sooooooo inspired by todayâ€™s office hour on interactive components, so I made this file to let us play with a gamepad and Figma. Have fun playing and remixing!


Release Note
